Class RefreshData

  • java.lang.Object
      • edu.ubb.marp.database.RefreshData

  • public class RefreshData
extends
    AsyncTask class, which makes the database refreshing
    Author:
    Rakosi Alpar, Vizer Arnold

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.Boolean complex
      This variable is true, if the table has more than one primary key column

      ContentResolver object, through this we can access the Content provider
      private boolean leaveOld
      If this variable is true, old values are leaved in the database

      • RefreshData

           java.lang.Boolean complex,
           boolean leaveOld)
        Public constructor, which initializes the variables
        Parameters:
        uri - Uri object, which identifies the table, which has to be updated
        cr - ContentResolver object, through this we can access the Content provider
        mainColumns - String array, which contains the names of the primary key columns of the table
        requestid - Requestid, which identifies the request
        service - The service object
        complex - This variable is true, if the table has more than one primary key column
        leaveOld - If this variable is true, old values are leaved in the database
